Profile.Name: Alejandro Sanz Martin
Description: Right now I'm living in Finland. I study Information Technology in Metropolia University of Applied Sciences.
In my free time I study Finnish and different kinds of programming languages. I'm interested in clouds and server administration, programming and web developing and databases, for example.

I am very curious person, I like to know how things work. This helps me to get a better understanding of the subject and helps me to do my job better. I am also detail oriented and proactive. I don’t like to sit at my desk doing nothing. I like to find something to keep myself busy, even on a slow day.
